issue.title: Hokuyo laser sensor in DRC Sim should conform to REP 117

content.raw: The documentation for MultiRayShape states that GetRange returns DBL_MAX for no detection but this is not the case. It simply returns the max range of the sensor which makes it impossible to filter missed detections from noisy close to max range readings.
content.html: The documentation for MultiRayShape states that GetRange returns DBL_MAX for no detection but this is not the case. It simply returns the max range of the sensor which makes it impossible to filter missed detections from noisy close to max range readings.
